mapper.select: SELECT ACT.activity_id, ACT.activity_name, ACC.name, ACT.activity_desc, ACT.expiration_time, ACT.activity_time, ACT.img1, ACT.img2, ACT.img3, ACT.img4, ACT.img5, ACT.img6, COUNT(ACT_MEM.account_id) AS activity_members_num FROM activity AS ACT, account AS ACC, activity_member AS ACT_MEM WHERE ACT.account_id = ACC.account_id AND ACT.activity_id = ACT_MEM.activity_id AND ACT.activity_id = #{activityId};

SELECT ACT.activity_id, ACT.activity_name, ACC.name, ACT.activity_desc, ACT.expiration_time, ACT.activity_time, ACT.img1, ACT.img2, ACT.img3, ACT.img4, ACT.img5, ACT.img6, COUNT(ACT_MEM.account_id) AS activity_members_num FROM activity AS ACT, account AS ACC, activity_member AS ACT_MEM WHERE ACT.account_id = ACC.account_id AND ACT.activity_id = ACT_MEM.activity_id AND INSTR(ACT.activity_name, #{nameKeyWord}) > 0 GROUP BY ACT.activity_id;
